description: Product: Hyaluronic Acid SerumYouthful & Radiant: READY?Hi, this is Pamela, Co-Founder of Day by Day Beauty.Day by Day Beauty's Hyaluronic Acid Serum delivers a BOOST of moisture to any skin type - including aged, delicate & sensitive skin - creating that luminous & supple look, WITHOUT any greasy feeling.Our Secret "Hydration Machine"Hyaluronic Acid holds moisture and adjusts its absorption rate based on your environment & air humidity levels. So this Serum will deliver what YOUR skin needs, regardless of skin type or location!What to Expect?...With consistent use, you'll see a reduction in fine lines & wrinkles....Infused antioxidants will protect your skin from environmental aggressors and free radicals....Calms inflammation & locks in moisture to PLUMP skin cells.How to use?Apply both morning & evening on cleansed and toned skin. Sensitive Skin? We've designed our Hyaluronic Acid Serum for ALL SKIN TYPES and complexions.Organic & eco-friendly lover?Day by Day Beauty is too. (#1 above) Feel secure with my personal "Pamela's-Promise" Guarantee: your 100% Satisfaction Promise for the lifetime of the product. This allows you to try and see the results for yourself - Risk-Free. (#5 above)Don't wait: Our Serum is always made Natural & Fresh, so supplies are limited.Stock-up & SAVE with LIMITED-TIME Promotions!Feel the Day by Day Difference.Pamela, Co-Founder, Day by Day BeautyClick the yellow "ADD TO CART" Button Now to Order Your Hyaluronic Acid Serum While Stock Lasts.
title: Hyaluronic Acid Serum For Skin: Put Your Best Face Forward With Potent Hyaluronic Acid, Essential Vitamin C & More ~ Enjoy Benefits Of Natural, Deep Hydration & Boosted Collagen Production ~ Supplements With Antioxidants To Reduce Fine Lines & Wrinkles.
